description: Julia Furner has asked for regular screening for children and support training for teachers.
title: Manx mother calls for better dyslexia support in schools
title_page: Manx mother calls for better dyslexia support in schools - BBC News
maintext: "If children are given the resources from a very young age then they are more likely to have better self-esteem, understand their own learning needs from an earlier age," she added.
